words.prompt: ___________ means looks up to something or someone very highly.
A ___________ is a person who is in the same class at school.
A ___________ is a group of people who live in a certain area. They may share similar interests.
To ___________ means to supply, give, or bring something about.
___________ means doing something over and over to gain skill.
To ___________ means to speak or say the sound of a letter or word.
___________ means to be afraid of or frightened by something.
___________ means suddenly fell in a helpless way or turned and rolled around.
When you ___________, you do something special.
___________ is bravery in a difficult situation.
When something is a ___________, a person is sad because something is not as good as expected.
Something is ___________ if it is very valuable to you.
___________ is a feeling of satisfaction in something you have done.
When you ___________ someone, you make that person remember something.
You use ___________ to represent ideas or objects.
A ___________ is something that has been done for a long time.
A ___________ is an important building, large object, or place.
A person who has ___________ something, cut it into a piece or shape.
___________ are hints that help someone find something or solve a mystery.
___________ means great, large, or magnificent.
Something that is ___________ is extremely large or heavy.
A ___________ is a building, statue, or object that honors a person or event.
Something that is ___________ has a characteristic of or has to do with a nation or its government.
___________ are small bits or signs left behind that show something was there.
